description: This is a system generated manifest of files expected to be present in this zip. It can be safely deleted.

manifest.description: Is an example of what your submission file should look like. The order of the rows does not matter, but the names of the "ID" must be correct.

manifest.filename: Schools and Health Facilities in Freddy Locations.xlsx
manifest.description: Schools and facilities within 1km and 2km from the epicentre of the damaged area in Chilobwe / Soche Mountain.
